verses.verse: Judge <S%H8199><s%> me <S%H3068><s%>, O Lord; for I have walked <S%H1980><s%> in my integrity <S%H8537><s%>: I have trusted <S%H982><s%> also in the Lord <S%H3068><s%>; therefore I shall not slide <S%H4571><s%>.
Examine <S%H974><s%> me <S%H3068><s%>, O Lord, and prove <S%H5254><s%> me <S%H6884><s%>; try my minds <S%H3629><s%> and my heart <S%H3820><s%>.
For your lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> is before my eyes <S%H5869><s%>: and I have walked <S%H1980><s%> in your truth <S%H571><s%>.
I have not sat <S%H3427><s%> with vain <S%H7723><s%> persons <S%H4962><s%>, neither will I go in <S%H935><s%> with dissemblers <S%H5956><s%>.
I have hated <S%H8130><s%> the congregation <S%H6951><s%> of evil doers <S%H7489><s%>; and will not sit <S%H3427><s%> with the wicked <S%H7563><s%>.
I will wash <S%H7364><s%> my hands <S%H3709><s%> in innocence <S%H5356><s%>: so will I compass <S%H5437><s%> your altar <S%H4196><s%>, O Lord <S%H3068><s%>:
That I may publish <S%H8085><s%> with the voice <S%H6963><s%> of thanksgiving <S%H8426><s%>, and tell <S%H5608><s%> of all your wondrous works <S%H6381><s%>.
Lord <S%H3068><s%>, I have loved <S%H157><s%> the habitation <S%H4583><s%> of your house <S%H1004><s%>, and the place <S%H4725><s%> where your honor <S%H3519><s%> dwells <S%H4908><s%>.
Gather <S%H622><s%> not my soul <S%H5315><s%> with sinners <S%H2400><s%>, nor my life <S%H2416><s%> with bloody <S%H1818><s%> men <S%H582><s%>:
In whose hands <S%H3027><s%> is mischief <S%H2154><s%>, and their right hand <S%H3225><s%> is full <S%H4390><s%> of bribes <S%H7810><s%>.
But as for me <S%H3212><s%>, I will walk in my integrity <S%H8537><s%>: redeem <S%H6299><s%> me <S%H2603><s%>, and be merciful unto me.
My foot <S%H7272><s%> stands <S%H5975><s%> in a even place <S%H4334><s%>: in the congregations <S%H4721><s%> will I bless <S%H1288><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.
